channel.title: Background?
channel.description:
How can i add a background behind the loading bar ? [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ufc61f.jpg[/img]
Thanks

item.title: Background?
item.dc:creator: @Lirimoo Lirimoo
item.description:
@Lirimoo wrote:

[quote=“ggson, post:2, topic:507652”]All you have to do, is go in to the cache folder where ever it is located, and look for background.png in the sprites/spirts folder, in your case, look for a black square. (in the images). Then open it in photoshop or what ever program you would like to edit, it with. Then when you are done making your background, save it as the same name and format it already was (replace it). I hope this helped
p.s. you shouldn’t be making an rsps if you don’t know the easiest part of an rsps :->[/quote]

Read full topic

@drubrkletern wrote:

item.title: Background?
item.dc:creator: @ggson ggson
item.description:
@ggson wrote:

All you have to do, is go in to the cache folder where ever it is located, and look for background.png in the sprites/spirts folder, in your case, look for a black square. (in the images). Then open it in photoshop or what ever program you would like to edit, it with. Then when you are done making your background, save it as the same name and format it already was (replace it). I hope this helped
p.s. you shouldn’t be making an rsps if you don’t know the easiest part of an rsps :->

Read full topic
